item.title: Missing Semester Assignment
item.description: Sheel Tools https://missing.csail.mit.edu/2020/shell-tools/ Q1 Question Read man ls and write an ls command that lists files in the following manner Includes all files, including hidden files Sizes are listed in human readable format (e.g. 454M instead of 454279954) Files are ordered by recency Output is colorized A sample output would look like this drwxr-xr-x 5 user group 160 Jan 14 09:53 . -rw-r--r-- 1 user group 514 Jan 14 06:42 bar -rw-r--r-- 1 user group 106M Jan 13 12:12 foo drwx------+ 47 user group 1.
